high_descs: Go forward to approach the bed.
Pick up the pillow nearest to you on the bed.
Turn around, go to the doorway, then turn right to face the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow in the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
pick up the green pillow that is on the bed
turn around, walk forward, turn right to face the lamp on the dresser, hold the pillow up
anns.task_desc: examine a pillow with the lamp
